dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 2000 structures, each obtained by distributing at random 64 particles inside cubic cells of varying size, such that no particles are closer than 2.5 Ã…. The energies of these systems are learned using linear models built either on short-range or LODE descriptors.
dcterms:title: Toy Dataset

dcterms:description: The BioFragment Database (BFDb) is an open-data platform for computational chemistry analysis of noncovalent interactions, containing 2291 pairs created from 22 relaxed organic molecules.
dcterms:title: BioFragment Database (BFDb)

dcterms:creator: A. Grisafi
J. Nigam
M. Ceriotti
dcterms:description: A dataset containing a diverse collection of molecular dimers used to push the method to its limits, focusing on long-range interactions.
dcterms:title: Dimer Dataset
